hadiths.text: Narrated `Urwa:Usama was asked in my presence, "How was the speed of (the camel of) Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) while departing from `Arafat during the Hajjatul Wada`?" Usama replied, "The Prophet (ﷺ) proceeded on with a modest pace, and when there was enough space he would (make his camel) go very fast

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّيْرِ إِذَا دَفَعَ مِنْ عَرَفَةَ
